metadata.title: CVE-2021-47435 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:dm: fix mempool NULL pointer race when completing IOdm_io_dec_pending() calls end_io_acct() first and will then dec mdin-flight pending count. But if a task is swapping DM table at sametime this can result in a crash due to mempool->elements being NULL:task1                             task2do_resume ->do_suspend  ->dm_wait_for_completion
